tags.name: ef-tree
tags.description:
Displays a tree structure
to be used for menus and group selections

attributes.name: multiple
attributes.description: Allows multiple items to be selected

attributes.name: no-relation
attributes.description:
Breaks the relationship when multiple
selection mode is enabled

properties.name: multiple
properties.description: Allows multiple items to be selected

properties.name: noRelation
properties.description:
Breaks the relationship when multiple
selection mode is enabled

properties.name: renderer
properties.description: Renderer used for generating tree items

properties.name: data
properties.description: Data object to be used for creating tree

events.name: value-changed
events.description: Fired when the users changed selection item.

events.name: expanded-changed
events.description: Fired when an item's expanded state has changed.
